contactText: You can get help in choosing a product, find out about the availability of the product you are interested in, and the delivery conditions, you can contact the manager.

deliveryShort2: We are ready to deliver custom orders for items that are not in our store's catalog.
popularBrandsSubtitle: We have a big choice of the most popular tire brands

tireSelectionServiceDesription: Selection and sale of tires for trucks and cars
serviceStationDescription: Truck and passenger tire fitting, repair of tires and wheels of any complexity, cutting of truck tire tread
storageDescription: Seasonal storage of tires and assemblies wheel
name: First Name
filterAsideHeaderWidth: How finding the the tire width?
filterAsideText1: Look at the markings on the already installed tires or in the manual for the car.
filterAsideText2: The size is indicated as follows:
filterAsideText3Width: is the width value in millimeters.
filterAsideHeaderProfile: How finding the tire profile height?
filterAsideText3Profile: is the value of the profile height in percent.
filterAsideText3Diametr: is the diameter value in inches.
filterAsideHeaderPrice: Do you know how much you are willing to pay for new tires?
filterAsideText1Price: Set this parameter with the help of two 'sliders' and you will see suitable options.
filterAsideHeaderSeason: What are the differences between tires for different seasons?
filterAsideText1Season: Winter tires are intended for use at air temperatures below +5 degrees Celsius.
filterAsideText2Season: Summer tires are effective in the period when the average daily temperature exceeds +5 degrees Celsius.
filterAsideText3Season: All-season tires will be able to provide safety at temperatures not lower than -5 degrees Celsius.
filterAsideHeaderBrand: Do you have a favorite tire brand?
filterAsideText1Brand: We have products from several hundred brands.
filterAsideText2Brand: All products are certified, covered by an official manufacturer's warranty.
filterAsideHeaderStudded: What types of tires do you prefer?
filterAsideText1Studded: Do you drive in severe winter conditions? Consider studded tires for enhanced grip on ice and snow.
filterAsideText2Studded: Prefer quieter, more versatile tires? Choose studless for improved performance in diverse settings.
pickupFromWarehouses: There is a possibility of pickup from warehouses in Vinnytsia according to the working schedule
returnsDescription: You can return the goods within 14 days from the date of purchase
returnsDescription2: The goods must be in the original packaging, unused, with the original labels and documents
